segments.text: I wonder if you can help me . I ’ m looking for a room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ Ve get a small room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 35.00 dollars a week , but I don ’ t allow smoking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK.Can I see the room now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you mind waiting ? I ’ m on the telephone .
segments.speaker: S2
